-> start
Hello, @! Welcome to this story.
+ Go to the forest -> forest
+ Visit the village -> village

-> forest
You walk into the dark forest. It's quiet...
+ Keep walking -> deep_forest
+ Return to start -> start

-> village
The village is full of life.
+ Talk to the elder -> elder
+ Go back -> start

-> elder
Blhablhablha
+ Go back -> start
+ Go to the forest -> forest

-> deep_forest
You are lost in the forest. The End.
